results.title: Changes in serum interleukin-6 and high-sensitivity C-reactive protein levels in patients with acute coronary syndrome and their responses to simvastatin.
results.text_hl: @SPECIES_9606 @@@Patients@@@ in the @DISEASE_Acute_Coronary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D054058 @@@ACS@@@ group were randomly assigned to a @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ group (including a @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ @DISEASE_Myocardial_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D009203 @@@AMI@@@ subgroup, n = 11 and a @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Angina_Unstable</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000789 @@@UA@@@ subgroup, n = 14) and a routine group (including a routine @DISEASE_Myocardial_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D009203 @@@AMI@@@ subgroup, n = 9 and a routine @<m>DISEASE_Angina_Unstable</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000789 @@@UA@@@ subgroup, n = 16).

results.title: Evaluating cardiovascular event reduction with ezetimibe as an adjunct to simvastatin in 18,144 patients after acute coronary syndromes: final baseline characteristics of the IMPROVE-IT study population.
results.text_hl: The @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ monotherapy arm's LDL-C target is <70 mg/dL.

results.title: [IMProved Reduction of Outcomes: Vytorin Efficacy International Trial (studie IMPROVE-IT)].
results.text_hl: Compared to @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Coronary_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D003327 @@@coronary heart disease@@@ given the drug @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ plus a placebo, those given both @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and the non-statin drug, @CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069438 @@@ezetimibe@@@, had a 6.4 % lower combined risk of subsequent @DISEASE_Myocardial_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D009203 @@@heart attack@@@, @DISEASE_Stroke @DISEASE_MESH:D020521 @@@stroke@@@, @DISEASE_Cardiovascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D002318 @@@cardiovascular death@@@, rehospitalization for @<m>DISEASE_Angina_Unstable</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000789 @@@unstable angina@@@ and procedures to restore blood flow to the heart.

citations.NLM: Špinar J, Špinarová L, Vítovec J. [IMProved Reduction of Outcomes: Vytorin Efficacy International Trial (studie IMPROVE-IT)]. Vnitr Lek. 2014 Dec;60(12):1095-101. PMID: 25692840

results.title: [Special characteristics of progression of myocardial remodeling in patients with various forms of unstable angina].
results.text_hl: IMPLICATION: The use of complex therapy with @CHEMICAL_Aspirin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001241 @@@acetylsalicylic acid@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Angina_Unstable</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000789 @@@UA@@@, @CHEMICAL_Perindopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D020913 @@@perindopril@@@, @CHEMICAL_Nebivolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068577 @@@nebivolol@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ is justified for prevention @DISEASE_Ventricular_Remodeling @DISEASE_MESH:D020257 @@@LV remodeling@@@ and lowering of rate of acute @DISEASE_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D007511 @@@ischemia@@@ recurrence and @DISEASE_Heart_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@CHF@@@ development.

results.title: Lipid-lowering efficacy and safety of varying doses of Simvastatin in patients with early stage acute coronary syndromes: one-year follow-up study.
results.text_hl: OBJECTIVE: To investigate whether @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@, who are at risk of major @DISEASE_Acute_Coronary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D054058 @@@acute coronary events@@@, are safe to undergo and benefit from early intervention after using @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@. METHODS: The study was a randomized, open, two-dosage-controlled trial to evaluate the safety and benefits of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ administered to 197 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ (10 mg group, n = 98 and 20 mg group, n = 99), within 48 hours of hospitalization for a diagnosis of @<m>DISEASE_Angina_Unstable</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000789 @@@unstable angina@@@ or acute @DISEASE_Myocardial_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D009203 @@@myocardial infarction@@@ (MI), with total @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@ (TC) >/= 180 mg/dL or low-density lipoprotein cholesterol (LDL-C) >/= 100 mg/dL.

citations.NLM: Zou Y, Hu D, Yang X, Xu Z, Cui L, Liu X, Wei Y, Gao M. Lipid-lowering efficacy and safety of varying doses of Simvastatin in patients with early stage acute coronary syndromes: one-year follow-up study. Chin Med J (Engl). 2003 Jun;116(6):853-6. PMID: 12877794
citations.BibTeX: @article{12877794, title={Lipid-lowering efficacy and safety of varying doses of Simvastatin in patients with early stage acute coronary syndromes: one-year follow-up study.}, author={Zou Y and Hu D and Yang X and Xu Z and Cui L and Liu X and Wei Y and Gao M}, journal={Chin Med J (Engl)}, volume={116}, number={6}, pages={853-6}}

results.title: Reduction in Total Cardiovascular Events With Ezetimibe/Simvastatin Post-Acute Coronary Syndrome: The IMPROVE-IT Trial.
results.text_hl: METHODS: All PEP events (@DISEASE_Cardiovascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D002318 @@@cardiovascular [CV] death@@@, @DISEASE_Myocardial_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D009203 @@@myocardial infarction@@@ [MI], @DISEASE_Stroke @DISEASE_MESH:D020521 @@@stroke@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Angina_Unstable</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000789 @@@unstable angina@@@ [UA] leading to hospitalization, coronary revascularization >=30 days post-randomization) during a median 6-year follow-up were analyzed in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ randomized to receive @CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069438 @@@ezetimibe@@@/@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ or placebo/@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ in IMPROVE-IT.

citations.NLM: Murphy SA, Cannon CP, Blazing MA, Giugliano RP, White JA, Lokhnygina Y, Reist C, Im K, Bohula EA, Isaza D, Lopez-Sendon J, Dellborg M, Kher U, Tershakovec AM, Braunwald E. Reduction in Total Cardiovascular Events With Ezetimibe/Simvastatin Post-Acute Coronary Syndrome: The IMPROVE-IT Trial. J Am Coll Cardiol. 2016 Feb 2;67(4):353-361. PMID: 26821621

results.title: Benefits of early lipid-lowering intervention in high-risk patients: the lipid intervention strategies for coronary patients study.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: The immediate-@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ group (n = 73) and the deferred-@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ group (n = 78) were balanced with respect to baseline characteristics.
